articles.author: Brad Lendon, Jacob Lev
articles.title: Travis Bazzana becomes first Australian ever taken with top pick in Major League Baseball draft - CNN
articles.description: The Cleveland Guardians selected Australian second baseman Travis Bazzana with the top pick in the 2024 Major League Baseball Draft on Sunday, the first time an Aussie has been taken in the first round, let alone with the first overall pick, for the world’s p…
